TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StructureChangeType extends System.Enum

summary.span: Contém valores que especificam as alterações na estrutura da árvore de elementos de Automação da Interface do Usuário da Microsoft.

span.span: Contains values that specify changes in the structure of the Microsoft UI Automation element tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildAdded = int32(0)

summary.span: Um elemento filho foi adicionado à árvore de elementos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

span.span: A child element was added to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildRemoved = int32(1)

summary.span: Um elemento filho foi removido da árvore de elementos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

span.span: A child element was removed from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildrenBulkAdded = int32(3)

summary.span: Elementos filho foram adicionados à árvore de elementos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

span.span: Child elements were added to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildrenBulkRemoved = int32(4)

summary.span: Elementos filho foram removidos da árvore de elementos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

span.span: Child elements were removed from the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildrenInvalidated = int32(2)

summary.span: Elementos filho foram invalidados na árvore de elementos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

span.span: Child elements were invalidated in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.

summary.span: Isso pode significar que um ou mais filhos foram adicionados ou removidos, dependendo da implementação de provedores de Automação da Interface do Usuário.

span.span: This might mean that one or more children were added or removed, depending on the UI Automation providers implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType ChildrenReordered = int32(5)

summary.span: A ordem dos elementos filhos na árvore de elementos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] mudou.

span.span: The order of the child elements in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree changed.
